remarks: Closure of the quotient map in a free group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.)
statement:
frgp0.m $e |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) $.
frgp0.r $e |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) $.
frgpeccl.w $e |- W = ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) $.
frgpeccl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
frgpeccl $p |- ( X e. W -> [ X ] .~ e. B ) $.
